word: The commercial work is not to be divorced from the Office. When the Lord would have this done, he will make the matter so plain that we shall understand his mind and will. Connection with outside parties need be no more detriment to any one than was Daniel's work as a statesman a perversion of his religious faith and principles. There are many sides to this matter, and it is a great pity that seeds of thought are dropped in regard to changes that keep minds in an unsettled condition, or leave them in uncertainty. Ideas that are positively misleading strike the mind, and are expressed. This is always fruitful of evil results. All such influences are unsettling. They create disorder and disorganization.
